entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
